channel.title: Please help us rate the app!
channel.description:
Hey!
We removed the demo sounds for new users and got a bunch of negative reviews from people who don't want to pay for the app. So we realized this was a bad idea and added the demo sounds back again. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
We also reset the app ratings, so it would be very helpful if you could help us [rate the latest version](https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1034348186) in the App Store. It needs at least 10 ratings in each country for the rating to show up on the app page etc.
Thanks! üôè

item.title: Please help us rate the app!
item.dc:creator: Jax
item.description:
Done! Glad to see the demo sounds back! I had a couple of people text me they could use it now lol

Read full topic
item.source: Please help us rate the app!

item.title: Please help us rate the app!
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Hey!

We removed the demo sounds for new users and got a bunch of negative reviews from people who don‚Äôt want to pay for the app. So we realized this was a bad idea and added the demo sounds back again.

We also reset the app ratings, so it would be very helpful if you could help us rate the latest version in the App Store. It needs at least 10 ratings in each country for the rating to show up on the app page etc.

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Please help us rate the app!
